trans-unit.resname: PH22·1 | Treizeci, Sun of Serra | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Treizeci, Sun of Serra
trans-unit.target: Treizeci, Sun of Serra

trans-unit.resname: PH22·1 | Treizeci, Sun of Serra | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Companion — Your starting deck contains only nostalgic cards. (Retro frames, legends, and artifacts are nostalgic.)
trans-unit.target: Companion — Your starting deck contains only nostalgic cards. (Retro frames, legends, and artifacts are nostalgic.)

trans-unit.resname: PH22·1 | Treizeci, Sun of Serra | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: Vigilance

trans-unit.resname: PH22·1 | Treizeci, Sun of Serra | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a nostalgic spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Treizeci, then for each +1/+1 counter on it, create a Serra Angel token.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a nostalgic spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Treizeci, then for each +1/+1 counter on it, create a Serra Angel token.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·2 | Elusen, the Giving | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elusen, the Giving
trans-unit.target: Elusen, the Giving

trans-unit.resname: PH22·2 | Elusen, the Giving | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance, lifelink, haste
trans-unit.target: Flying, vigilance, lifelink, haste

trans-unit.resname: PH22·2 | Elusen, the Giving | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, the player to your left gains control of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, the player to your left gains control of CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·2 | Elusen, the Giving | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player donates a permanent to another player, the donating player draws a card, gains 1 life, and creates three Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a player donates a permanent to another player, the donating player draws a card, gains 1 life, and creates three Treasure tokens.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·3 | Heroes of Kamigawa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heroes of Kamigawa
trans-unit.target: Heroes of Kamigawa

trans-unit.resname: PH22·3 | Heroes of Kamigawa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each spell you cast with a name printed in a Kamigawa expansion costs {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: Each spell you cast with a name printed in a Kamigawa expansion costs {1} less to cast.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·3 | Heroes of Kamigawa | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Open up to one sealed Kamigawa booster pack and shuffle those cards into your booster pile. Look at the top four cards of your booster pile. Put two of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: [+2]: Open up to one sealed Kamigawa booster pack and shuffle those cards into your booster pile. Look at the top four cards of your booster pile. Put two of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·3 | Heroes of Kamigawa | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Return a creature card with a name printed in a Kamigawa expansion from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Return a creature card with a name printed in a Kamigawa expansion from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·3 | Heroes of Kamigawa | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME can be your commander.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·4 | Svega, the Unconventional | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Svega, the Unconventional
trans-unit.target: Svega, the Unconventional

trans-unit.resname: PH22·4 | Svega, the Unconventional | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a loyalty counter on target planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a loyalty counter on target planeswalker.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·4 | Svega, the Unconventional | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: For each planeswalker type among planeswalkers you control, create a 1/1 Attendee creature token that's all colors.
trans-unit.target: [−2]: For each planeswalker type among planeswalkers you control, create a 1/1 Attendee creature token that's all colors.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·4 | Svega, the Unconventional | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−X]: Choose an Elspeth, Teferi, Liliana, Chandra, or Garruk planeswalker card name with mana value X. Create a copy of the card with the chosen name. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: [−X]: Choose an Elspeth, Teferi, Liliana, Chandra, or Garruk planeswalker card name with mana value X. Create a copy of the card with the chosen name. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·4 | Svega, the Unconventional | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Svega can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: Svega can be your commander.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·5 | Wizard from Beyond | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wizard from Beyond
trans-unit.target: Wizard from Beyond

trans-unit.resname: PH22·5 | Wizard from Beyond | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a Character (Any nonlegendary creature can choose this as its Background. It becomes legendary and can be your commander.)
trans-unit.target: Create a Character (Any nonlegendary creature can choose this as its Background. It becomes legendary and can be your commander.)

trans-unit.resname: PH22·5 | Wizard from Beyond | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you own are Clerics, Rogues, Warriors, and Wizards in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: Commander creatures you own are Clerics, Rogues, Warriors, and Wizards in addition to their other types.

trans-unit.resname: PH22·5 | Wizard from Beyond | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: As long as you have a full party, if an ability of a creature you control triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: As long as you have a full party, if an ability of a creature you control triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.
